Kon Ichikawa is a reknown director with a background in anima=
tion.  In
this clip he depicts Ikedaya Jigen.  One voice actor Kiichi Nakai=
 will
go on to play Yoshimura Kani'chiro in MIBUGISHIDEN.  This film is
bas=
ed on the famous comic by Hiroshi Kurogane.  Back in 2000 the
Shinsengumi c=
raze had not really taken root yet (aside from Rurouni
Kenshin based fandom=
) thus making this small budget venture "lost" to
later fans.  Many online =
communities love this depiction and I myself
admire the atmosphere and crea=
tivity which went into this film.  It
would have been neat if when a sword =
cuts through someone you hear the
sound of tearing paper...

I hope fans ev=
erywhere will try making their own Shinsengumi films and
try any genre usin=
g whatever means you have.  Last year I made
"IkeDIEya" using Easter Eggs..=
.it was fun and the exact opposite of
Kon Ichikawa's grim black and white a=
pproach...I went with a more
bright colorful approach because it was "filme=
d" in my refrigerator. 
Even if Shinsengumi media such as manga and film ha=
ve entered a
dormant period fans can continue to have fun by producing thei=
r work
and sharing with a community.

I endeavour to report on the progress=
 of the SHQ site very soon so
that all our supporter and donors can see whe=
re their contributions went.
